setting.label: Polling frequency for if playback time reached skip position
setting.values: 50 milliseconds | 100 milliseconds | 200 milliseconds | 300 milliseconds | 500 milliseconds | 750 milliseconds | 1 second | 2 seconds | 5 seconds

setting.label: Allow 'skip.txt' to be case-insensative (results in reading directory contents for each play).
